topic: Unexplored passions in renewable energy careers
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that surprising discoveries are most likely to emerge from introspection and exploring areas outside my usual comfort zone. To act on this, I will commit to journaling regularly to uncover subconscious motivations and biases, and allocate time each week to engage in new activities or learn about unfamiliar subjects. This dual approach aims to reveal internal insights and ignite potential passions that could lead to personal growth.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
